translation.en: Huh? What is that noise?
[Cap] What's that?
Eh?
Oh, my goodness.
It's a monster! [thuds]
Save me!
[Cleany] What? There's a monster living near the reservoir?
translation.ko: 뭐? 저수지 근처에 괴물이 살고 있다고?

translation.en: Yes, that's right.
Wearing a terrifying cloak over its head.
And with these huge hands,
I can't tell you how weird it looked.
You think, that you saw the unlucky wanderer?
translation.ko: 너 혹시 불행의 나그네를 만난 거 아니야?

translation.en: [all] The unlucky wanderer?
Hm. There's a story that there used to be a figure like that in Toto Village.
translation.ko: 응, 토토 마을에 그런 친구가 있었다는 소문을 들은 적이 있거든

translation.en: The reason that he got that name,
was anyone who met him would have lots of bad luck.
Like they've been cursed by a magician or something.
translation.ko: 꼭 마법사의 저주를 받은 것처럼 말이지

translation.en: Then, did the unlucky wanderer put some sort of evil curse on me?
translation.ko: 그럼, 이제 나도 불행의 나그네의 저주를 받게 되는 거야?

translation.en: [Jin] Unlucky wanderer?
First time I've heard of him.
[all] Us, too.
Anyway, do you really think that something is wrong?
Posty said there was.
He told us that the wanderer gives off a curse of terrible luck.
translation.ko: 그 친구가 불행을 가져오는 저주 같은 걸 퍼붓는다는 거야

translation.en: But it could just be some kind of rumor.
Nothing bad has actually happened to Cap yet, has it?
translation.ko: 정말 캡한테 무슨 일이 일어난 것도 아니잖아

translation.en: No, but, what if bad things do start happening to Cap?
translation.ko: 하지만 앞으로 안 좋은 일들이 생기면 어떡해?

translation.en: It could be dangerous if it turns out that it's true.
translation.ko: 소문대로 아주 위험한 친구일 수도 있다고!

translation.en: Come on.
Helly, you can't just say anything you want about someone you don't know.
translation.ko: 잘 알지도 못하는 친구에 대해 그렇게 함부로 말하면 안 돼

translation.en: Yeah, you're right about that. We should first meet this unknown friend
translation.ko: 그래, 그건 진 말이 맞아 내 생각엔 일단 만나서

translation.en: and then find out what kind of person he is.
translation.ko: 어떤 친구인지 알아보는 게 좋을 것 같아

translation.en: [all] Right.
According to Helly, he should be near here.
translation.ko: 헬리 말대로라면 이 근처인 것 같은데?

translation.en: Huh? Poli that tent hasn't been there before.
You're right.
-Let's take a look. -Let's.
[both] Hello, there.
[Roy] Is anyone home?
Maybe we're not close enough.
Hi, friend.
Who are you? I said, who are you? [both gasp]
translation.ko: - 실례합니... - 누구야! - 너희들은 누구냐니까? - 우린 브룸스타운 구조대야

translation.en: The Rescue Team of Brooms Town.
I'm Poli and this is Roy.
Hi, there.
We heard you were here. So, we came to say welcome.
translation.ko: 우연히 네 소식을 듣고 인사를 하러 왔어

translation.en: Welcome?
Lies! You came to kick me out!
translation.ko: 흥! 거짓말 날 쫓아내려고 온 거잖아?

translation.en: What on earth do you mean?
We were curious about you is all.
No! Don't come near me!
[thumps] I don't believe you! Go away!
translation.ko: 난 너희들을 믿지 않아 어서 돌아가!

translation.en: Wait a minute, don't be like that.
Just listen to us, friend.
There's nothing to hear.
Are you all right?
Yeah, I'm all right.
I'm... I'm sorry! [whimpers]
[Helly] I told you.
Didn't I tell you that he was dangerous?
I don't think that he meant to hurt Poli at all.
translation.ko: 하지만 일부러 폴리를 다치게 한 건 아닐 거야

translation.en: It was an accident.
Right. And I wasn't really hurt that much.
Well, I'm just glad it's all done.
I'll be sure to fix the damage in the morning, all right?
translation.ko: 정비는 내일 날이 밝는 대로 해 줄게

translation.en: -Hm. -I wonder,
translation.ko: 응 그나저나 그 친구는 정말 그대로 둬도 될까?

translation.en: should we just leave him out there like that?
translation.ko: 그나저나 그 친구는 정말 그대로 둬도 될까?

translation.en: Don't worry.
He didn't actually seem like a bad person.
In fact, it seemed like he was pretty scared.
translation.ko: 오히려 겁이 잔뜩 난 것처럼 보였어

translation.en: [groans] What a mess.
If he wasn't a bad guy,
then he wouldn't have acted like that with you.
What if he has a problem he can't tell anyone about?
translation.ko: 우리한테 말 못 할 사정이 있었을지도 모르지

translation.en: The fact is, we might very well need to take a closer look at him.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 좀 더 자세히 알아볼 필요가 있을 것 같긴 한데?

translation.en: We should ask our friends who used to live in Toto Village.
translation.ko: 토토 마을에 살다가 우리 마을에 온 친구들은

translation.en: They might know something about this unlucky wanderer.
translation.ko: 불행의 나그네에 대해 뭔가 좀 알고 있지 않을까?

translation.en: You might be right.
Then, that's what we'll do. Amber and I will head out in the morning.
translation.ko: 내일 날이 밝는 대로 내가 엠버랑 자세히 알아보도록 할게

translation.en: [Poli and Amber] We'll be back.
[Jin] Good luck, Poli and Amber.
[Posty] Cap, no matter how scared of the wanderer you are,
translation.ko: 캡, 아무리 불행의 나그네가 무서워도 그렇지

translation.en: you can't expect us to come with you every time you have to come this way.
translation.ko: 이 길을 지날 때마다 우리가 항상 같이 다닐 수는 없는 노릇이라고

translation.en: Oh, what choice do I have?
I'm too scared to come here all by myself.
translation.ko: 난 이 길을 혼자서 도저히 못 다니겠다고

translation.en: It must be hard for Cap to feel this scared.
I even feel a little bit scared.
I'm terrified.
Something might jump out at us.
All right, just calm down.
Even if something does, it'll be up against four of us.
translation.ko: 우린 넷이나 되니까 함부로 덤비진 못할 거야

translation.en: Well, anyway, I wonder what the Rescue Team is going to do.
translation.ko: 그나저나 구조대는 불행의 나그네를 어떻게 할 셈이지?

translation.en: Huh? What's this?
-Do you think it's the curse? -[all] What?
translation.ko: 설마 너 저주가 시작된 거야? - 뭐? - 뭐?

translation.en: [groans] Wait, guys.
[rattling] Uh, what's that sound I hear?
[whimpering] Get out of the way!
Don't come near us.
Don't put a curse on us!
-Get out of our town. -[all] Get out!
[gasps] I need to get by, so get out of my way.
[Jin] What? He got bullied by his friends because of his looks?
translation.ko: "구조 본부" 뭐? 겉모습 때문에 친구들에게 따돌림을 당했다고?

translation.en: Mm-hm. Tracky is his name. But because he has such big hands,
translation.ko: 응, 원래 이름은 트랙키인데 남들보다 유난히 큰 손 때문에

translation.en: they made fun of him by calling him Monster Tracky.
Then, I guess he started wearing the cloth to cover himself
translation.ko: 그것 때문인지 지금처럼 자기 몸을 가리고 다니면서

translation.en: and he began to avoid his friends.
And he probably lived like a loner until he ended up in our town.
translation.ko: 그 뒤로 줄곧 외톨이로 지내다 우리 마을로 오게 된 것 같아

translation.en: But, what about all these rumors that he causes bad luck.
translation.ko: 그럼, 그 친구가 불행을 가져온다는 소문은?

translation.en: That must be a misunderstanding.
His friends said they never actually saw anything bad happen around them.
translation.ko: 실제로 나쁜 일이 생긴 걸 직접 본 친구는 아무도 없었대

translation.en: I see.
I was judging him as a bad guy, too,
when I didn't know anything about him.
That's why you can't judge anybody
because of rumors, or because of the way they look.
Rescue Team, this is Jin.
Jin, you have to make the unlucky wanderer get out of town.
translation.ko: 진, 빨리 불행의 나그네를 마을에서 쫓아내 줘!

translation.en: What are you talking about, Posty?
Cap's front bumper just suddenly fell off.
The curse of the unlucky wanderer has started to work!
translation.ko: 불행의 나그네의 저주가 시작된 거란 말이야

translation.en: And we have just seen the unlucky wanderer, too.
translation.ko: 게다가 우리도 방금 그 나그네를 봤다고!

translation.en: [all] He's so scary!
All right, calm down.
Tracky isn't going to hurt anyone.
We'll find a way to settle this in a friendly way, so just hold on.
translation.ko: 우리가 문제없이 일을 해결해 줄 테니까 조금만 기다려 줘

translation.en: All right, then. We'll trust you guys.
This is quite a problem.
We really need to hurry and get this all cleared up.
translation.ko: 빨리 트랙키에 대한 오해를 풀어 줘야겠어

translation.en: Well, first, we'll have to get him to open up, which will be difficult
translation.ko: 그러려면 트랙키의 마음을 열어야 하는데 쉽진 않을 거야

translation.en: because his heart is frozen solid like a block of ice.
translation.ko: 지금 트랙키의 마음은 꽁꽁 얼어붙은 얼음 같으니까

translation.en: Then, how about this time we all go together to welcome him.
translation.ko: 그럼 이번에 다 함께 가서 트랙키를 만나 보는 건 어때?

translation.en: Great. If the whole team goes there, we can succeed in melting his heart.
translation.ko: 그래, 우리 모두 힘을 합치면 트랙키의 마음을 열 수 있을 거야

translation.en: [all chuckle] Good, let's go then.
Why do I have to walk this way?
translation.ko: 난 도대체 왜 이렇게 생긴 걸까?

translation.en: The floodgate is leaking!
What do I do?
If the wall breaks, the town will flood.
translation.ko: 둑이 터지면 마을이 모두 물에 잠길 텐데...

translation.en: The flow is too strong.
I can't hold it.
Somebody help me!
What if he doesn't wanna talk to us, after we've come all this way.
translation.ko: 여기까지 왔는데 우리를 만나 주지 않으면 어떡하지?

translation.en: Let's try calling his name.
[all] Tracky.
There's no answer.
He might be trying to avoid us.
translation.ko: 우리가 온 걸 알고 피하는 걸까?

translation.en: Perhaps...
[Tracky] Is anybody there?
-[all] Huh? -[Helly] Where is that coming from?
Hm. Tracky is over there by the reservoir.
[Helly] Oh, my! Tracky is holding up the breaking floodgate with his body.
translation.ko: 세상에! 무너지려는 수문을 트랙키가 온몸으로 막고 있어

translation.en: [all] What?
Helly, fly ahead and help Tracky.
Will do.
Let's get over there. [siren blaring]
Who are you?
I'm with the Rescue Team. Help is coming, just hold on.
translation.ko: 난 구조대야, 널 도우러 오고 있으니까 힘내!

translation.en: All right. [grunts]
Amber, when we get there you need to stabilize the wall.
translation.ko: 엠버, 도착하면 수문이 무너지지 않게 지지해 줘

translation.en: [Poli] Roy, when Tracky moves, lock the hole with a boulder.
translation.ko: 트랙키가 빠져나오면 로이는 적당한 바위로 구멍을 막아 주고

translation.en: -Got it. -Got it.
[Amber] Tracky, hold on.
We're ready, Poli.
I'm ready as well.
Tracky, now just carefully come out.
translation.ko: 트랙키, 이제 침착하게 앞으로 나와 줘

translation.en: Roy, come on.
I'm almost there.
Tracky, you saved our whole town.
[all] Mm-hm.
[all] Thank you so much, Tracky.
There's nothing to thank.
I... I did it to save my fields.
translation.ko: 내 밭이 망가질까 봐 그런 거니까...

translation.en: Well, then, I'll be going.
Hold on, Tracky.
We came out here looking for you because we want to become your friends.
translation.ko: 우린 사실 오늘 너와 친구가 되려고 찾아온 거였어

translation.en: Friends?
Yes. If you could just find a way to open your heart to us,
translation.ko: 그래, 그러니까 우리에게 마음을 조금만 열어 줘

translation.en: then we could all become your friends.
translation.ko: 너와 친구가 될 수 있게 말이야

translation.en: No, uh, that's okay.
I'm sure everyone wouldn't like me anyway.
translation.ko: 어차피 다들 날 싫어할 게 분명해

translation.en: Not if they got the chance to actually get to know you.
translation.ko: 그건 친구들이 널 잘 몰라서 그런 걸 거야

translation.en: I already think of you as a friend.
Me, too.
You just need to let everybody see the person that you really are.
translation.ko: 그러니까 다른 친구들에게 너의 진짜 모습을 보여 줘

translation.en: Yeah, Tracky. I know you could do this.
And we can help.
But you won't...
[all] Tracky. Please come out.
translation.ko: - 트랙키! 제발 나와 줘 - 트랙키! 제발 나와 줘

translation.en: Let's be friends, Tracky.
translation.ko: - 친구 하자, 트랙키! - 친구 하자, 트랙키!

translation.en: Not coming out again today?
I was really hoping to meet him.
Tracky, if you aren't ready to come out, we can come back later.
translation.ko: 트랙키, 아직 용기가 나지 않는다면 다음에 다시 올게

translation.en: [Tracky] W-Wait. I'll be out in a bit.
He's finally coming out. [cheering]
Well, hello. Tracky is my name.
Nice to meet all of you.
It's great to know you, Tracky.
I thought you'd see my big hands and get all scared of me or something.
translation.ko: 난 너희들이 내 큰 손을 보고 깜짝 놀랄 줄 알았는데

translation.en: No way, Tracky.
We see they're nothing like the rumor said.
Yes. We're sorry that we thought you are something that you're not.
translation.ko: 응, 그동안 너에 대해 오해해서 정말 미안해

translation.en: [all] We're really sorry, Tracky.
translation.ko: - 정말 미안해, 트랙키 - 정말 미안해, 트랙키

translation.en: That's all right.
It's just so nice that you guys all accept me now.
translation.ko: 이제라도 날 이해해 줘서 정말 고마워

translation.en: How nice.
We're all really pleased that you opened up your heart to us.
translation.ko: 우리야말로 네가 마음을 열어 줘서 얼마나 기쁜지 몰라

translation.en: Tracky, let me welcome you to our town, friend.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 트랙키 우리 마을에 온 걸 환영해

translation.en: [all] Welcome to our town.
Thank you.
[Helly] Tracky, it's official.
You are a lifelong friend.
Don't ever go away.
Oh, okay.
Here we go!
